modName: Dragonplate Helmet Fix and Alternate Masked Version
summary: Fixes clipping issues with the Dragonplate Helmet and adds a crafting recipe for a new masked version. All races included.
descriptionHtml:
I started working on this because of a request to add a mask to the dragonplate helm, but when I realized how horribly the helm clipped with the player character\'s head I knew I had to release this as a bug fix.

This mod fixes clipping issues with the Dragonplate Helmet and adds a craftable standalone masked version. Works for all races!

Known issues: Some beards and orc brows will still show clipping.

Leave a comment if I missed any clipping problems, or you find any other issues for me to address.



INSTALL

Copy contents of the zip file to your Skyrim Data folder.

Run the launcher and make sure \"DragonplateHelmFix.esp\" is selected in the Data files list.

If you haven\'t enabled data files already the option will be greyed out. To enable data files go to to the folder \"Users/*yourname*/My Documents/MyGames/Skyrim\" and look for the file \"SkyrimPrefs.ini\". Open it and find the \"[Launcher]\" section. Under that section, put the line \"bEnableFileSelection=1\" and save the file. The option should no longer be greyed out.

UPDATE HISTORY

Version 1.1
- Added fixed helms for orcs and beast races
- Combined the masked version and default version. The masked version is now a standalone recipe.



I require no credit given or permissions asked if you would like to edit any files included in this mod or use them in a mod of your own. Enjoy.
